definition: to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们并不认同那些片面夸大反向收购作用的作法。

sentences.english: And the Gunners will fund it with their windfall for ex-skipper Patrick…
sentences.chinese: 枪手将会用卖出前队长的前来收购他。

sentences.english: Buy the pass on a message of sina to Microsoft general, the expert inside course of study expresses generally open-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 对微软将收购新浪的传言，业内专家普遍表示惊讶。

sentences.english: Except they have a tendency to just straight up purchase the technology rather then re-make it.
sentences.chinese: 他们有意图就直截了当的收购技术而非重新制造一遍。

sentences.english: Still, the deal has some logic and it may change the IT industry.
sentences.chinese: 这个收购仍然是有一些逻辑并且它可能会改变IT业。

sentences.english: This suggests that state acquirers tend to have a stronger tunneling incentive.
sentences.chinese: 这表明国有收购方有更强的激励趋向于操作隧道挖掘。

sentences.english: Expedia’s acquisition of eLong may be a case in point.
sentences.chinese: Expedia对艺龙的收购也许就是很好的例子。

sentences.english: Homer Software continues its rapid growth and is acquired for $100m.
sentences.chinese: 荷马软件保持高速成长，并以1亿美元的价格被收购。

sentences.english: Terms of the sale were not disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 此次收购的具体条款尚未公布。

sentences.english: Ye Lang finally wait until the old company calls, the acquisition agreement is received.
sentences.chinese: 叶朗终于等到旧公司的来电，收购协议书亦收到。

sentences.english: Then, at about 10 a.m., J.P. Morgan suddenly withdrew its offer.
sentences.chinese: 上午10点左右，JP摩根突然撤销了收购申请。

sentences.english: However, Longcheer Yacht Club has been always an independent brand which exists and will continually exist after VANKE purchased Longcheer.
sentences.chinese: 收购后的浪骑游艇会仍作为一个独立品牌而存在。

sentences.english: This can be a surreptitious method of mounting a takeover bid.
sentences.chinese: 这可以是秘密发起收购的一种方式。

sentences.english: You mentioned that Qunar had acquisition offers.
sentences.chinese: 你提到去哪儿收到过收购要约。

sentences.english: We also have acquired internet assets that are in liquidation or bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 我们也收购了一些已倒闭或破产的网络资产？

sentences.english: After the acquisition, Citigroup would delist the company from Indian bourses .
sentences.chinese: 完成收购后，它将从印度股市中摘牌。

definition: merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
to bid competitively/to compete to buy (at auction)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
Time Warner Inc., US media company
consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
